name: Chicken Nugget Dunk
description:
Who ever told you that playing with your food was a bad thing did not play the Chicken Nugget Dunk Game.

A Game full of Burgers, French Fries, Onion Rings and Chicken Nuggets!

This unique, addicting and super fun skill, puzzle game challenges you to get the Chicken Nuggets to the sauce without them hitting the floor.

Simply use the French Fry Ramps to guide the Nuggets around random objects to Win and Unlock levels.

With 20 levels of Hungry Chicken Nugget Play, this unique fast food inspired puzzle game will provide hours or boredom crushing entertainment.

Here is what you get:

*20 Levels of Play
*Perfect for all Ages
*Play with your food
*Fun Game Play

Can you Save the Chicken Nuggets from landing on the floor?

Kids from 4 to 80 will love to solve the puzzles all while playing with their food without getting in trouble.

Game is not only fun to play but it also helps increase concentration, problem solving when playing the puzzles.

FREE Updates for Life!

Order your Chicken Nuggets Dunk Now!
